clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Controlled Clinical Trials, on Adult Patients With T-lymphoblastic Lymphoma Treated With Intensive Chemo/Radiotherapy or Intensive Chemotherapy Followed by Transplant. Evaluation of Clinical, Anatomy -Pathological Parameters
clinical_study.official_title: Observational Controlled Clinical Trials, on Adult Patients With T-lymphoblastic Lymphoma Treated With Intensive Chemo/Radiotherapy or Intensive Chemotherapy Followed by Transplant. Evaluation of Clinical, Anatomy-pathological Parameters

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to create a prospective database of T-Lymphoblastic Lymphoma (T-LBL) cases in order to conduct an appropriate statistical study as well as to monitor diagnosis and minimal residual disease (MRD), to detect specific genetic profile useful to give advices on therapies, to assess if PET has a prognostic validity on T-Lymphoblastic Lymphoma (T-LBL).

primary_outcome.measure: To create a prospective database of T-lymphoblastic lymphoma cases on adult patients in order to conduct an appropriate statistical study.

secondary_outcome.measure: To monitor histological and immunophenotypical diagnosis and to make a minimal residual disease (MRD) molecular study in order to verify if minimal residual disease (MRD) prognostic value observed in children is confirmed in adult patients.
To make a gene expression analysis on T-Lymphoblastic Lymphoma patients to detect specific genetic profiles useful to give prognostic and therapy response advices.
To validated the prognostic systems already identified in T-Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia cases that can be useful to label the high-risk for Lymphoblastic Lymphoma patients.
To evaluate if PET has a prognostic value in T-Lymphoblastic Lymphoma cases.

arm_group.description: Adult patients with T-lymphoblastic lymphoma treated with intensive chemo/radiotherapy or intensive chemotherapy followed by transplant.

intervention.intervention_name: Latest generation chemotherapies for T-LBL + transplant
intervention.description: Standard doses of one of the following chemotherapies: Holzer LSA2-L2 modified Stanford regimen Hyper CVAD Sequential treatments analogous to the ones above mentioned (e.g.: GIMEMA LAL094, others) Intensive chemotherapy, ALL-type, MRD oriented (NILG-TLL Clinical Trial) Autologous transplant or allogeneic transplant or mini-allogeneic transplant

biospec_descr.textblock: Involved lymph nodes biopsy; biopsies performed in other areas affected by lymphoma; bone marrow blood; peripheral blood.

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients with T-lymphoblastic lymphoma treated with intensive chemo/radiotherapy or intensive chemotherapy followed by transplant.
